data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Eat when you're hungry. Don't ____ too ____ or ____ little ____. Try ____ eat ____ that doesn't have ____ much ____ or ____. Include ____ and ____ in ____ diet. If you eat something that often makes your stomach hurt or feel bad, avoid that food.
data.partBlankContent: Eat when you're hungry. Don't e__ too mu__ or t__ little fo__. Try t_ eat fo__ that doesn't have t__ much f__ or su___. Include veget_____ and fr___ in yo__ diet. If you eat something that often makes your stomach hurt or feel bad, avoid that food.
data.fullContent: Eat when you're hungry. Don't eat too much or too little food. Try to eat food that doesn't have too much fat or sugar. Include vegetables and fruit in your diet. If you eat something that often makes your stomach hurt or feel bad, avoid that food.
data.answer: 饿了就吃。不要吃太多或太少的食物。尽量吃不含太多脂肪和糖的食物。在你的饮食中包括蔬菜和水果。如果你吃的东西经常让你的胃疼或感觉不好，避免这种食物。
